rows.label: qev090503_MSG0001
rows.name:
She was one of my best and brightest.
The first to earn a spot aboard the Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0002
rows.name:
Heh. That's the moment Reggie started training like mad.
Most obvious crush I ever saw.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0003
rows.name: He made the cut at the last minute, but only just.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_JNK0010
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev090503_SEL0011
rows.name: Comfort the saddened Bozé.

rows.label: qev090503_JNK0020
rows.name: Lecture

rows.label: qev090503_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Bozé to stop hiding behind his memories.

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0004
rows.name: You speak like the Buddha himself, friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0005
rows.name:
I thank you.
Such kindness is the fuel that keeps me going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0006
rows.name: You are without mercy, friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0007
rows.name:
But I thank you.
Such discipline keeps me on the true path.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0008
rows.name: All right. I have the tags.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0009
rows.name:
Will you grant me a moment to offer up
a prayer for the departed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0010
rows.name: I need her soul to find the peace it never had here on Mira...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev090503_SEL0031
rows.name: Give Bozé his moment.

rows.label: qev090503_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev090503_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Bozé you don't have time for such things.

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0011
rows.name: Thank you. It means everything to me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0012
rows.name: KAAAAAAAAAATSU![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0013
rows.name:
How does one with no respect for
the dead hope to protect the living?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0014
rows.name:
Buddha, hear my prayer!
Namo Amitabhaya![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090503_MSG0015
rows.name:
...Mmm. Sorry to keep you waiting.
Let us head home.[ST:wait ]
